title: Elijah the Prophet Appears
summary: Elijah proclaims a drought in Israel and is fed miraculously by ravens. Later, he stays with a widow in Zarephath and miraculously multiplies her food. When her son dies, Elijah raises him back to life through prayer.

faq.question: What miracle began Elijahâ€™s ministry?
faq.answer: He prophesied a drought that would last several years.

faq.question: How did God provide for Elijah and the widow?
faq.answer: Through unending flour and oil, and later raising her son from the dead.
